com.admob.android.ads
Interface AdListener

All Known Implementing Classes:
SimpleAdListener
public interface AdListener

Implement this interface to be notified when an ad is received from the servers. The SimpleAdListener class is provided as convenience if you are only interested in some of the events.

Register the listener with the AdView.setAdListener method.

Method Summary
 void onFailedToReceiveAd(AdView adView)
          Called when an ad request fails to get a new ad.
 void onFailedToReceiveRefreshedAd(AdView adView)
          Called when a refresh of an ad view fails.
 void onReceiveAd(AdView adView)
          Called when a new ad has been received and is about to be displayed.
 void onReceiveRefreshedAd(AdView adView)
          Called when a refresh of an ad view is successful.
 

Method Detail

onReceiveAd

void onReceiveAd(AdView adView)
Called when a new ad has been received and is about to be displayed.

Parameters:
adView - is the view that received and will show the new ad.

onFailedToReceiveAd

void onFailedToReceiveAd(AdView adView)
Called when an ad request fails to get a new ad. This can happen for a number of reasons. For instance if there is no Internet connection (i.e. out of cell range and not connected to wifi). Another common reason is no fill which means there are no ads to show at this moment.

Parameters:
adView - is the view that did not receive the new ad.

onReceiveRefreshedAd

void onReceiveRefreshedAd(AdView adView)
Called when a refresh of an ad view is successful.

Parameters:
adView - view that received and will show a refreshed ad.

onFailedToReceiveRefreshedAd

void onFailedToReceiveRefreshedAd(AdView adView)
Called when a refresh of an ad view fails.

Parameters:
adView - view that did not receive the new ad.
